type: Legendary Creature – Bird Performer Shapeshifter Noble
rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Blessing[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control with flying.
[i]Princess of Serenes [/i]– Whenever Leanne, Mesmerizing Chanteur attacks, untap up to two other target creatures you control, then tap up to two target creatures you don't control.
